You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesU U] > &uopf;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Uopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D54C.
  * `&uopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D566.
